name: Policies with other program should be defaulted as 'Wholesale Bill', user can select the 'Wholesale bill' wherever applicable

testSteps.description: Given underwriter has ability to create quote
And with program name is 'FedEx Custom Critical'
When underwriter calculates premium for quote
And underwriter is on home page
When underwriter navigates to Payment Plan

Then Bill type should have following options
| Wholesale Bill |
